@title Eliptic curve signature operations

recover(bytes32,bytes).details: Recover signer address from a message by using his signature

params.hash: bytes32 message, the hash is the signed message. What is recovered is the signer address.
params.sig: bytes signature, the signature is generated using web3.eth.sign()
